items.text: Rainforests are like nature's skyscrapers, with trees reaching high up into the sky, creating a leafy roof that keeps the ground shady and cool!
There are two main types of rainforests: tropical ones that are warm and humid, and temperate ones that are cooler and often found in places with four seasons.
In Brazil, satellite images show how lush green rainforests are being replaced by bare fields, reminding us how important it is to take care of our planet!
